TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AL extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension

Docs.summary: Implements the AL task. Use the AL element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see [AL (Assembly Linker) Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2ddefbf2-5662-4d55-99a6-ac383bf44560).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void AddResponseFileCommands (Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CommandLineBuilderExtension commandLine);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void AddResponseFileCommands(class Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CommandLineBuilderExtension commandLine) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub AddResponseFileCommands (commandLine As CommandLineBuilderExtension)

Docs.param: Command line builder to add arguments to.
Docs.summary: Fills the specified parameter with switches and other information that can go into a response file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AlgorithmId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AlgorithmId : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an algorithm to hash all files in a multifile assembly except the file that contains the assembly manifest.
Docs.value: 雜湊多檔案組件中所有檔案的演算法，但包含組件資訊清單的檔案除外。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/algid` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BaseAddress { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BaseAddress : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the address at which a DLL will be loaded on the user’s computer at run time.
Docs.value: 在執行階段將 DLL 載入使用者電腦上的位址。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您指定 DLL 的基底位址，而不是讓作業系統重新找出處理序空間中的 DLL，應用程式載入的速度會更快。 此屬性會對應至 /base [address] 選項中[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CompanyName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CompanyName : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Company field in the assembly.
Docs.value: 公司組件中的欄位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/comp[any]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Configuration { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Configuration : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Configuration field in the assembly.
Docs.value: 組態組件中的欄位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/config[uration]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Copyright { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Copyright : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Copyright field in the assembly.
Docs.value: 著作權組件中的欄位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/copy[right]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Culture { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Culture : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the culture string to associate with the assembly.
Docs.value: 與組件相關聯的文化特性字串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/c[ulture]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DelaySign { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DelaySign : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to place only the public key in the assembly () or to fully sign the assembly ().
Docs.value: 如果僅將公開金鑰放在組件中，則為 ，如果完整簽署組件，則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/delay[sign]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Description field in the assembly.
Docs.value: 描述組件中的欄位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/descr[iption]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ EmbedResources { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.EmbedResources : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the resources to embed in the image that contains the assembly manifest.
Docs.value: 要內嵌在含有組件資訊清單之影像中的資源。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此工作會將資源檔的內容複製到映像。 設定這個屬性中的項目可能連接到這些呼叫的選擇性中繼資料`LogicalName`和`Access`。 `LogicalName` 中繼資料可用來指定資源的內部識別項。 您可以將 `Access` 中繼資料設為 `private`，以便讓其他組件無法看見資源。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/embed[resource]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ EvidenceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.EvidenceFile : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the file to embed in the assembly with the resource name of Security.Evidence.
Docs.value: 若要將內嵌的資源名稱的組件檔案Security.Evidence。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Security.Evidence` 無法用於一般資源。 這個屬性會對應至`/e[vidence]`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Execute() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Execute () As Boolean

Docs.summary: Executes the AL task.

member this.FileVersion : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the File Version field in the assembly.
Docs.value: 檔案版本組件中的欄位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/fileversion` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Flags { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Flags : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Flags field in the assembly.
Docs.value: 旗標組件中的欄位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/flags` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool GenerateFullPaths { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.GenerateFullPaths : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to cause the task to use the absolute path for any files that are reported in an error message.
Docs.value: 如果此工作將會報告錯誤訊息; 中的任何檔案使用絕對路徑否則， 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會對應至`/fullpaths`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GenerateFullPathToTool() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GenerateFullPathToTool () As String

Docs.summary: Returns the full file path to the AL tool.
Docs.returns: The full file path to the AL tool.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyContainer { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeyContainer : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a container that holds a key pair.
Docs.value: 保留金鑰組的容器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這樣會藉由將公開金鑰插入組件資訊清單中的方式簽署組件 (為它指定強式名稱)。 工作接著將使用私密金鑰來簽署最終組件。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/keyn[ame]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeyFile : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a file that contains a key pair or just a public key to sign an assembly.
Docs.value: 包含金鑰組或只包含公開金鑰來簽署組件的檔案。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編譯器會將公開金鑰插入組件資訊清單中，然後使用私密金鑰簽署最終組件。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/keyf[ile]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ LinkResources { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.LinkResources : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the resource files to link to an assembly.
Docs.value: 要連結至組件的資源檔。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資源會變成組件的一部分，但不會複製檔案。 傳遞給這個參數的項目可能具有已附加到它們的選擇性中繼資料，稱為 `LogicalName`、`Target` 及 `Access`。 `LogicalName` 中繼資料可用來指定資源的內部識別項。 `Target` 中繼資料可以指定工作要將檔案複製到其中的路徑和檔案名稱，之後它會將這個新檔案編譯成組件。 您可以將 `Access` 中繼資料設為 `private`，以便讓其他組件無法看見資源。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/link[resource]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MainEntryPoint { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MainEntryPoint : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the fully qualified name (*class.method*) of the method to use as an entry point when converting a module to an executable file.
Docs.value: 完整的名稱 (* class.method*) 要將模組轉換成可執行檔時，做為進入點使用的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會對應至`/main`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^ OutputAssembly { Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^ value); };
member this.OutputAssembly : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the file generated by this task.
Docs.value: 這項工作產生的檔案名稱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會對應至`/out`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Platform { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Platform : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a string that limits which platform this code can run on; must be one of x86, Itanium, x64, or anycpu.
Docs.value: 字串，限制的平台上;，可以執行此程式碼必須是其中一個x86， Itanium， x64，或anycpu。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 `anycpu`。 這個屬性會對應至`/platform`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Prefer32Bit { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Prefer32Bit : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether the task runs on a 32 bit platform.
Docs.value: 傳回旗標的值。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ProductName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ProductName : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Product field in the assembly.
Docs.value: 產品組件中的欄位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/prod[uct]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ProductVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ProductVersion : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the ProductVersion field in the assembly.
Docs.value: ProductVersion組件中的欄位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/productv[ersion]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ ResponseFiles { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.ResponseFiles : string[] with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the names of the response files that contain commands for the AL tool.
Docs.value: 包含 AL 工具命令的回應檔名稱。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SdkToolsPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SdkToolsPath : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the path to the SDK tools.
Docs.value: 傳回 SDK 工具的路徑。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ SourceModules { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.SourceModules : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the modules to be compiled into an assembly.
Docs.value: 要編譯至組件中的模組。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模組將列在所產生組件的資訊清單中，且仍需依序散發和提供，才能載入組件。 傳遞到此參數的項目可能具有名為 `Target` 的其他中繼資料，以指定工作要將檔案複製到其中的路徑和檔案名稱，之後它會將這個新檔案編譯成組件。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 的說明文件。 此屬性會對應到不含特定參數傳遞至 Al.exe 模組的清單。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TargetType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TargetType : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the file format of the output file: library (code library), exe (console application), or win (Windows-based application).
Docs.value: 輸出檔的檔案格式：文件庫（程式碼庫）、 exe （主控台應用程式） 或win （windows 應用程式）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 `library`。 這個屬性會對應至`/t[arget]`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TemplateFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TemplateFile : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the assembly from which to inherit all assembly metadata, except the culture field.
Docs.value: 要從其中繼承所有組件中繼資料的組件，但不包括文化特性欄位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的組件必須具有強式名稱。 使用 `TemplateFile` 參數建立的組件會是附屬組件。 這個屬性會對應至`/template`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Title field in the assembly.
Docs.value: 標題組件中的欄位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/title` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property ToolName As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ ToolName { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the tool (Al.exe).
Docs.value: 工具的名稱。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Trademark { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Trademark : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Trademark field in the assembly.
Docs.value: 商標組件中的欄位。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/trade[mark]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Version { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Version : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the version information for this assembly.
Docs.value: 這個組件的版本資訊。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字串格式是 *major.minor.build.revision*。 預設值為 0。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/v[ersion]` 選項的說明文件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Win32Icon { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Win32Icon : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the .ico file to insert in the assembly.
Docs.value: 要插入組件的 .ico 檔案。

remarks.format: ## Remarks .Ico 檔案會讓輸出檔在 Windows 檔案總管 中所要的外觀。 這個屬性會對應至`/win32icon`選項[Al.exe （組件連結器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Win32Resource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Win32Resource : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Win32 resource (.res file) to insert in the output file.
Docs.value: 要插入輸出檔中的 Win32 資源 (.res 檔案)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Al.exe (組件連結器)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) 中 `/win32res` 選項的說明文件。
